title: Who is your least favorite Ateez member, and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: CHOI FORKING JONGHO. I hate this man for many reasons. He’s a thief. Does he think it’s okay to steal my heart?! On the first day, too?!His smile is blinding. I already have bad eyesight. Now I’m going to go blind.He looks better than me with blonde hair. I’m a natural blonde, yet he still looks better than me.He’s always making the other idols envy him. Yes Jongho, we know you are one of the best vocalists in the industry. You didn’t have to show off at MAMA.He’s stealing my spotlight. I used to be the special one for being left-handed, but Jongho had to come in and steal it. IT BOTHERS ME SO MUCH. It’s not like he couldn’t choose to be left-handed.He always makes fun of me. He’s over here breaking watermelons with his strength and I can’t even carry one without struggling.This man deserves to be in jail. Just look at that disgusting smile he gives.  In case you couldn’t tell, Jongho is one of my favorite artists in the whole industry. Why can’t any of the boys in my school be like him?
